name: Fallstar
description:
A deceptively simple game of concentration, dynamic triage and timing. Can you catch every piece before it's gone?

Tap the falling piece when it overlaps its match — the bigger the overlap, the more points!

Clear all the lanes for a bonus and ascend to the next level. Each level adds new shapes, sizes and distractions.

Play solo, or with another player. Illustrated with fractal fine art.

Built from scratch in Xcode for iOS, iPad and iPhone.
